bug.author: lcy-seso
bug.summary: Unittest for RNN encoder decoder without attention has a bug.
bug.description:
This model configuration has a bug: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/Paddle/blob/develop/python/paddle/v2/fluid/tests/book/test_machine_translation_encoder_context.py#L124>https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/Paddle/blob/develop/python/paddle/v2/fluid/tests/book/test_machine_translation_encoder_context.py#L124</denchmark-link>
When RNN unit processes sequence in reversed order, sequence first operator should be used to get the output in the last time step.
